definitions.name: make_comment
definitions.description:
Add a comment to a loan record.
Use this function when:
- A customer provides information that should be documented on their loan
- The agent needs to record important details from the conversation
- Documenting call outcomes or follow-up actions
- Recording customer requests or complaints.
This function will submit the comment to the loan servicing system and return a confirmation or error message.
Comments are permanently stored in the loan record and can be viewed by loan servicing staff.

user_id.description: The ID of the user making the comment (defaults to '88881' if not provided)

loan_number.description: The loan number to add a comment to

comment_text.description: The text of the comment to add to the loan record
